GLOBAL.ASSET_MANAGEMENT_TEXT.0: Sihlinzeka ngamasevisi aphelele okuphatha impahla ukuze silandelele, sigade, futhi sigcine izimpahla zakho ezibalulekile kuwo wonke umjikelezo wabo wokuphila.
GLOBAL.ASSET_MANAGEMENT_TEXT.1: Ithimba lethu lisebenzisa isofthiwe namasu okuphatha impahla ukuze lithuthukise ukusetshenziswa kwempahla, lilandelele umlando wokunakekelwa, kanye nohlelo lokushintshwa noma lokuthuthukisa.
GLOBAL.ASSET_MANAGEMENT_TEXT.2: Sikusiza ukuthi wenze izinqumo ezinolwazi mayelana nokugcinwa kwempahla, ukulungiswa, nokushintshwa, ukuqinisekisa ukonga kwezindleko nokusebenza okuphezulu.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_INTRO_TEXT: E- {{ companyName }}, sisebenza ngokukhethekile ekuhlinzekeni ngezixazululo ezishintshayo ezisezingeni eliphezulu zamabhizinisi abo bonke osayizi. Ithimba lethu lochwepheshe lihlanganisa ubuchwepheshe obusha nezinqubo ezingcono kakhulu zomkhakha ukuze lenze kahle izinqubo, lithuthukise ukukhiqiza, futhi liqhubekisele phambili ukukhula kwebhizinisi. Ngezinsizakalo zethu ezishintshayo, ungafinyelela ukusebenza kahle, unciphise izindleko, futhi uthole umkhawulo wokuncintisana emakethe yanamuhla ethuthuka ngokushesha.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_SUMMARY: Izwa amandla okuzenzakalela futhi uguqule ukusebenza kwebhizinisi lakho. Xhumana nathi namuhla ukuze uxoxe ngokuthi izinsiza zethu zokuzenzakalela zingayiguqula kanjani inhlangano yakho.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_TEXT.0: Ochwepheshe Abanolwazi: Ithimba lethu lihlanganisa ochwepheshe abanamakhono aphezulu nabanolwazi kubuchwepheshe be-automation nezindlela.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_TEXT.1: Izixazululo Ezihlanganisiwe: Siyaqonda ukuthi ibhizinisi ngalinye lihlukile. Sinikeza izixazululo ezizenzakalelayo ezizenzakalelayo ukuze zihlangabezane nezidingo zakho ezithile.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_TEXT.2: Ubufakazi Obukhulu Nobuzayo: Izixazululo zethu zokuzenzakalela ziklanyelwe ukukhula nebhizinisi lakho, kuqinisekiswe impumelelo yesikhathi eside.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_TEXT.3: Ayibizi kakhulu: Ngokuzenza ngokuzenzakalelayo imisebenzi ephindaphindwayo kanye nokuthuthukisa izinqubo, sikusiza wehlise izindleko zokusebenza futhi wandise inzuzo.
GLOBAL.AUTOMATION_OUTRO_TEXT.4: Ukuhlanganiswa Okungenazihibe: Izixazululo zethu zokuzenzakalela zihlangana kalula namasistimu akho akhona, ziqinisekisa ukushintshwa okushelelayo kanye nokuphazamiseka okuncane.
GLOBAL.CORRECTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.0: Esimeni lapho okokusebenza kuhluleka noma ukungasebenzi kahle, ochwepheshe bethu abanamakhono bayatholakala ukuze bahlinzeke ngezinsizakalo zokulungisa ezisheshayo nezisebenzayo.
GLOBAL.CORRECTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.1: Sihlonza inkinga, sisungula uhlelo lokusebenza, futhi sisebenzise ukulungisa okudingekayo ukuze sibuyisele okokusebenza kwakho esimweni esikahle sokusebenza.
GLOBAL.CORRECTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.2: Ukugxila kwethu kukunciphisa isikhathi sokuphumula nokwenza imisebenzi yakho ibuyele esimeni ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka.
GLOBAL.DATA_INTEGRATION_AND_WORKFLOW_AUT: Sivumela ukuhlanganiswa kwedatha okungenazihibe kuwo wonke amasistimu ahlukene, izinhlelo zokusebenza, nezizindalwazi.
Ithimba lethu lithuthukisa ukugeleza komsebenzi okuzenzakalelayo okuxhuma imithombo ehlukahlukene yedatha, ukuthuthukisa ukunemba kwedatha nokufinyeleleka.
Sisebenzisa izinkundla zokuhlanganisa kanye ne-automation eqhutshwa yi-API ukuze siqondise izinqubo zebhizinisi futhi sithuthukise ukusebenzisana.
GLOBAL.DESIGN_ENGINEERING_DESCRIPTION: Inqubo yemikhakha eminingi ebandakanya ukudala nokuthuthukisa imikhiqizo emisha noma amasistimu ngokusebenzisa izimiso zesayensi, ulwazi lobunjiniyela, nokudala ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo nezimfuneko ezithile.
GLOBAL.FACILITY_MAINTENACE_TEXT.0: Izinsizakalo zethu zokunakekelwa kwesikhungo zihlanganisa imisebenzi eminingi ukuze ugcine indawo yakho iphephile, iyasebenza, futhi ibukeka kahle.
GLOBAL.FACILITY_MAINTENACE_TEXT.1: Sihlinzeka ngokuhlolwa okujwayelekile, ukulungisa, nokugcina amasistimu kagesi, amapayipi amanzi, i-HVAC, izibani, amasistimu okuphepha, nokunye.
GLOBAL.FACILITY_MAINTENACE_TEXT.2: Umgomo wethu uwukwakha indawo yokusebenza enethezekile nephumelelayo yabasebenzi bakho kuyilapho ugcina ukuthobela izindinganiso zokulawula.
GLOBAL.INDUSTRIAL_AUTOMATION_TEXT.0: Sinikeza izixazululo eziphelele ze-automation yezimboni zokwandisa izinqubo zakho zokukhiqiza nokukhiqiza.
GLOBAL.INDUSTRIAL_AUTOMATION_TEXT.1: Ithimba lethu lakha futhi lisebenzisa amasistimu azenzakalelayo athuthukisa ukukhiqiza, aqinisekise ikhwalithi yomkhiqizo, futhi anciphise isikhathi sokungasebenzi.
GLOBAL.INDUSTRIAL_AUTOMATION_TEXT.2: Sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obufana ne-programmable logic controllers (PLCs), i-human-machine interfaces (HMIs), kanye nesistimu yokulawula nokutholwa kwedatha (i-SCADA).
GLOBAL.IT_INFRASTRUCTURE_AUTOMATION_TEXT: Sikusiza ukuthi uqondise futhi wenze ngokuzenzakalela ingqalasizinda yakho ye-IT ukuze uthuthukise ukusebenza kahle futhi unciphise ukungenelela mathupha.
Ochwepheshe bethu basebenzisa amathuluzi athuthukile nezindlela zokwenza ngokuzenzakalelayo ukunikezwa kweseva, ukuthunyelwa kwesofthiwe, nokucushwa kwenethiwekhi.
Sisebenzisa amasu okuzenzakalela ahlakaniphile ukuze sigade futhi siphathe ingqalasizinda yakho ye-IT, siqinisekisa ukusebenza kahle nokwethembeka.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_AND_GENERAL_WORK_DESC: Ukuphathwa okuphelele nokusebenza kokugcinwa okuvamile, ukulungisa, kanye nemisebenzi eyahlukene edingekayo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukusebenza kahle nokusebenza kobubanzi bomhlaba wonke bezikhungo noma amasistimu.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_INTRO_TEXT: E- {{ companyName }}, siyakuqonda ukubaluleka okubalulekile kokugcina okokusebenza kwakho, amasistimu, nengqalasizinda ukuze uqinisekise ukusebenza kwakho okuphezulu nokuphila isikhathi eside. Ngamasevisi ethu aphelele okulungisa, unganciphisa isikhathi sokuphumula, wandise ukukhiqiza, futhi wandise ukuphila kwempahla yakho. Ochwepheshe bethu abanolwazi nonjiniyela bahlome ngolwazi namathuluzi okuhlinzeka ngezixazululo zokulungisa ezisezingeni eliphezulu ezihambisana nezidingo zakho ezithile.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_SUMMARY: Faka imali ekunakekeleni okusebenzayo ukuze uvikele ukutshalwa kwezimali kwakho futhi uthuthukise ukusebenza kahle. Xhumana nathi namuhla ukuze uxoxe ngokuthi izinsiza zethu zokunakekela zingalizuzisa kanjani ibhizinisi lakho.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_TEXT.0: Ubungcweti nolwazi: Ochwepheshe bethu abanekhono nonjiniyela banolwazi olubanzi lokunakekela izinto zokusebenza namasistimu ahlukahlukene kuzo zonke izimboni ezihlukahlukene.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_TEXT.1: Izixazululo Ezingokwezifiso: Silungisa izinsiza zethu zokulungisa ukuze zihlangabezane nezidingo zakho ezithile kanye nezidingo zokusebenza.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_TEXT.2: Impendulo Ngesikhathi: Siyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokulungiswa ngokushesha. Ithimba lethu litholakala kalula ukuze libhekane nezidingo zakho zokunakekela futhi linciphise isikhathi sokuphumula.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_TEXT.3: I-Proactive Approach: Ngamasu okuvikela okuvikela nokubikezela, sikusiza ukuthi uhlale uphambi kwezinkinga ezingase zibe khona, unciphise ukuphuka okungalindelekile nokulungiswa okumba eqolo.
GLOBAL.MAINTENANCE_OUTRO_TEXT.4: Ukuthobelana Nokuphepha: Sithobela imithetho yemboni kanye namazinga okuphepha ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi okokusebenza nezinsiza zakho kugcinwa ngendlela evikelekile nethobelayo.
GLOBAL.OUR_CULTURE_TEXT: Sinikeza indawo enobungane, ethokozisayo futhi egcwele ubumnandi. Lapho singadlali i-basketball, sijabulela iziphuzo kanye nama-braai (noma okosa inyama) noma ukuphuma kwamahhovisi, sibhekana nezinselelo ezintsha, sithuthukisa izindlela ezintsha, sixoxa ngemibono yokudala futhi siwina njengeqembu.
GLOBAL.OUR_STORY_TEXT:
Just Enable wazalwa eminyakeni engaphezu kwengu-4 edlule. Ngezimpande zethu kubunjiniyela be-software sesivele ngoguquko lwedijithali futhi siyaqhubeka nokuvela. Ushintsho aluguquguquki, kepha okungakaze kushintshe indlela esisebenza ngayo nesifiso sethu sokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo. Namuhla, sisiza amaklayenti ethu ukuthi akhuthaze ukukhula kwebhizinisi ngokusebenzisa imizwa eholelekile yomsebenzisi, ukuqamba kanye nobuchwepheshe obakhelwe ukukala.

Ulwazi lwethu lochwepheshe, isipiliyoni kanye nerekhodi elifakazelwe liyasisiza ekunikezeni umnikelo oyingqayizivele, ogxile ekusebenzeni okuhle.
GLOBAL.PREDICTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.0: Ngokusebenzisa amandla okuhlaziya idatha kanye nobuchwepheshe bokuqapha isimo, sinikezela ngezinsizakalo zokulungisa ezibikezelayo.
GLOBAL.PREDICTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.1: Ochwepheshe bethu bahlaziya idatha yesikhathi sangempela kusukela kuzinzwa, amasistimu okuqapha, namalogu wempahla ukuze babikezele ukwehluleka okungaba khona noma ukuwohloka kokusebenza.
GLOBAL.PREDICTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.2: Sihlonza amaphethini, okudidayo, namathrendi ukuze sihlele imisebenzi yokulungisa ngokuqhubekayo, sithuthukise ukwabiwa kwezinsiza kanye nokunciphisa isikhathi sokuphumula.
GLOBAL.PREDICTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.3: Ukunakekela okuqagelayo kukusiza ukuthi ugweme ukulungisa okungahleliwe okumba eqolo futhi kukwenza ukwazi ukuhlela imisebenzi yokulungisa ngempumelelo.
GLOBAL.PREVENTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.0: Senza amasu okuvikela angokwezifiso ukuze sihlonze futhi sixazulule izinkinga ezingase zibe khona ngaphambi kokuba zibe izinkinga ezibizayo.
GLOBAL.PREVENTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.1: Ithimba lethu lenza ukuhlola okuvamile, ukusevisa okokusebenza, kanye nokulinganisa ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukusebenza okuphezulu nokuthembeka.
GLOBAL.PREVENTIVE_MAINTENANCE_TEXT.2: Sisebenzisa amathuluzi namasu okuxilonga athuthukile ukuze sihlonze futhi sixazulule izinkinga, sinciphise ukuhlukana okungalindelekile.
GLOBAL.PROCESS_AUTOMATION_TEXT.0: Sihlaziya izinqubo zakho ezikhona futhi sihlonze izindawo ezingenziwa ngokuzenzakalela ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukusebenza kahle nokunemba.
GLOBAL.PROCESS_AUTOMATION_TEXT.1: Ochwepheshe bethu baklama futhi basebenzise izixazululo ezizenzakalelayo ezihambisana nezidingo zakho zebhizinisi.
GLOBAL.PROCESS_AUTOMATION_TEXT.2: Sihlanganisa amathuluzi esofthiwe ahlakaniphile kanye ne-robotic process automation (RPA) ukuze senze imisebenzi ephindaphindwayo, ukufakwa kwedatha, nokuphathwa kokuhamba komsebenzi ngokuzenzakalelayo.
GLOBAL.PROJECT_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION: Umkhuba wokuhlela, ukuhlela, nokwenza imisebenzi ukuze kuzuzwe izinjongo ezithile kanye nokuletha imiphumela efiselekayo ngesikhathi esinqunyiwe nezinsiza ezabiwe.
GLOBAL.SOFTWARE_ENGINEERING_DESCRIPTION: Ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezihlelekile nezihlelekile zokuklama, ukuthuthukisa, nokugcina izixazululo zesofthiwe ngempumelelo nangokuthembekile.
GLOBAL.TECHNOLOGY_TEXT: Sihlinzeka ngamasevisi kagesi nawe-automation, futhi sakha izinhlelo zokusebenza nolwazi sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bakamuva nezinkundla
HOME.SUBTITLE: Uyayicabanga, siyayakha.
HOME.TITLE: Siletha izixazululo zikagesi, ezishintshayo nezedijithali
